functions.name: ReadOne
functions.description: Reads a single byte from this stream and returns it as an integer in the range from 0 to 255. Returns -1 if the end of the stream has been reached. Blocks until one byte has been read, the end of the source stream is detected or an exception is thrown.

functions.name: Read
functions.description: Reads at most length bytes from this stream and stores them in the byte array b starting at offset.

functions.name: WriteOne
functions.description: Writes a single byte to this stream. Only the least significant byte of the integer oneByte is written to the stream.

functions.name: Write
functions.description: Writes count bytes from the byte array buffer starting at position offset to this stream.
